detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a cotton blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Short skirt in imitation leather. High waist with a press-stud, a diagonal zip down the front, one fake pocket with a flap and press-stud and one real pocket with a zip. Lined.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shawl collar, buttons down the front, welt side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets, inner pockets and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Small handbag in paper straw with two handles and appliqués and embroidery on the front. Unlined. Size 3x12 cm.
Gently tailored jacket in a textured-weave viscose blend with a shawl collar, no buttons, pockets in the side seams and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Sleeveless jersey jumpsuit with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top, elastication and a tie belt at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless microfibre nightslip with triangular, lace-trimmed cups and adjustable shoulder straps.
Gently flared dungaree dress in airy cotton chambray with straps that cross at the back and fasten with press-studs. Elastication at the back of the waist.
All-in-one suit in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in woven fabric. Short top with a V-neck, ties at the front, cap sleeves and a small frill trim around the neckline and hem. Wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pleated cuffs and a pleated skirt. Partly lined.
Short satin shorts with flounces at the front and an elasticated waist.
Short satin shorts with flounces at the front and an elasticated waist.
Short satin shorts with flounces at the front and an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool and glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.

Set with a cardigan, long-sleeved shirt and bow tie. Fine-knit cardigan with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a pleated bodice. Small frilled collar and an opening with a button at the front. Long. wide sleeves with narrow elastication and frills at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with decorative embroidery over the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist, and flared hems. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short blouse in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, sewn-in knot detail at the front and long sleeves that are crinkled at the top and elasticated at the cuffs.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with short frilled sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt.

Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a stand-up collar with gathers and pleats. Gathers at the top, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight cotton twill with a drawstring and belt loops at the waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Shorts in lightweight cotton twill with a drawstring and belt loops at the waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Shorts in lightweight cotton twill with a drawstring and belt loops at the waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Jacquard-knit jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with an intarsia motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Thong briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a stand-up collar. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, a yoke at the back and press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.

Short, padded parka woven in a cotton blend with a faux fur-trimmed hood, tab with press-studs at the top and a zip with a button band down the front. Zipped pocket at the top, front pockets with a fake flap, a flap sleeve pocket with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
